channel.title: Somehwat difficult 508 question- Making NPC's attackable?
channel.description: My 508/503 server Will not let me attack ANYTHING.. How do I make NPC's attackable via 508/503? If your post actually works, ill give you rep on the count of this is very difficult and will help lots of people.

item.title: Somehwat difficult 508 question- Making NPC's attackable?
item.dc:creator: @ion5005 ion5005
item.description:
@ion5005 wrote:

I believe one server actually has NPCs that you can attack. This is a very basic form of P and NPC combat. If you download that source and study it. You will be able to find out how to make a bacis combat system for NPCs.

Read full topic
item.source: Somehwat difficult 508 question- Making NPC's attackable?
